584007913129639936
1000000000000000000

Price of each token is:
	1 ether
	1000000000000000000 wei
	
It's susceptible to overflow

2^256 / 1000000000000000000 wei
=
115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457

say I want to buy this much
115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039458 
	(above num plus one to overflow)

The msg.value needed after the overflow is 
415992086870360064

A helper contract was used: TokenSale
